p: At the late flowering stage (85 days after planting), D. moldavica plant growth parameters such as plant height, number of stem branches, leaf dry weight, leaf area and total biomass were recorded. At each sampling, all D. moldavica plants from a 50-cm length of the three middle rows of each plot were harvested by cutting at the soil surface. The areas of green leaves were measured using a leaf area meter (model: VM-900 E/K). All plant parts were oven-dried at 70 °C for 48 h until a constant weight was reached. At maturity (about four months after planting), the plants in an area of 1 m 2 were harvested to determine seed yield and 1000 seed weight.
